description: A helpful assistant for user questions.
name: sales_agent

skills.description: A helpful assistant for user questions. Answer user questions to the best of my knowledge.
skills.name: model

skills.description:
"Identify shipments that took longer than a specified number of days to deliver.
Example: [{
  "shipment_id": 102,
  "delivery_date": "2023-12-20"
}]"


Args:
    days_threshold (int): The threshold in days to define a late delivery (e.g., 7).
skills.name: find_late_deliveries

skills.description:
"Find all orders placed by a specific customer company.
Example: [{
  "order_id": 500,
  "order_date": "2023-10-01",
  "total_amount": 1200.50,
  "status": "Completed"
}]"


Args:
    company_name (str): The name of the customer's company (e.g., 'PT Global Logistics').
skills.name: find_orders_by_customer

skills.description:
"Find all orders handled by a specific employee using their email address.
Example: [{
  "order_id": 205,
  "order_date": "2023-09-15",
  "company_name": "Acme Corp",
  "total_amount": 500.00
}]"


Args:
    employee_email (str): The email address of the employee (e.g., 'sales1@company.com').
skills.name: find_orders_by_employee_email

skills.description:
"Find all shipments matching a specific status (e.g., 'In Transit', 'Delivered').
Example: [{
  "shipment_id": 88,
  "origin": "Jakarta",
  "destination": "Bandung",
  "carrier": "JNE"
}]"


Args:
    status (str): The current status of the shipment (e.g., 'In Transit').
skills.name: find_shipments_by_status

skills.description:
"Retrieve a comprehensive report of who sold what to whom and the current shipment location.
Example: [{
  "order_id": 101,
  "customer": "Tech Corp",
  "sales_rep": "Smith",
  "service": "Express Delivery",
  "shipment_status": "Delivered",
  "carrier": "DHL"
}]"
skills.name: get_order_fulfillment_report

skills.description:
"Retrieve shipment history and details for a specific order ID.
Example: [{
  "shipment_id": 42,
  "shipment_date": "2023-11-01",
  "delivery_date": "2023-11-03",
  "status": "Delivered"
}]"


Args:
    order_id (int): The unique identifier of the order.
skills.name: get_shipment_details_by_order
